arStrings.szText: When you first hit an enemy with an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill, {c_important}Petrify{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. {c_important}Petrifying{/c} an enemy additionally deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Physical damage.
